achievements.name: Resting In My Account...
achievements.description: Embezzle 10000 in funds.

achievements.name: This is Total War!
achievements.description: Win the game having declared war on every faction the turn you encountered them, as well as never negotiating a peace treaty.

achievements.name: Bloodthirsty
achievements.description: Kill 10,000 enemy in battles

achievements.name: Butcher
achievements.description: Kill 100,000 enemy in battles

achievements.name: Gore-drenched
achievements.description: Kill 1,000,000 enemy in battles

achievements.name: Veni, Vedi, Vici!
achievements.description: Complete an entire campaign, by playing and winning every battle

achievements.name: A Scourge is Born
achievements.description: Ensure your faction survives until Attila the Hun is born.

achievements.name: Social Climber
achievements.description: Arrange a promotion for a member of your family.

achievements.name: Take No Prisoners
achievements.description: Destroy an entire enemy army, killing everyone and taking no prisoners.

achievements.name: Scholae Romanes
achievements.description: Research all technologies available to the Western Roman Empire.

achievements.name: Cupid's Arrow
achievements.description: Arrange 20 Marriages

achievements.name: Cloak & Dagger
achievements.description: Ensure 1 of each agent type (priest, spy and veteran) attains the highest level at the same time.

achievements.name: Grizzled Veterans
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign whilst fielding an army or fleet undefeated since the start.

achievements.name: Burn Baby Burn
achievements.description: Sack 10 Settlements as The Huns.

achievements.name: Beheading the Snake
achievements.description: As the Vandals, sack the city of Roma.

achievements.name: Against All Odds
achievements.description: Win a campaign battle in which you are outnumbered 10-to-1.

achievements.name: The Other Way
achievements.description: Change your faction's state religion to minor religions.

achievements.name: Tribute
achievements.description: As the Huns, obtain a state gift of 2,000 from the Romans.

achievements.name: The More Things Change
achievements.description: Change your state religion and convert 50% of your empire's population to it.

achievements.name: Nepotism
achievements.description: Ensure that 3 successive generations of characters from the same family reach level 5.

achievements.name: Attila the Dead
achievements.description: Kill Attila the Hun by any means at your disposal.

achievements.name: Demagoguery
achievements.description: Use a priest's Preach Intolerance ability on a settlement 3 times.

achievements.name: Saboteur
achievements.description: Use a veteran's Sabotage ability on a settlement 3 times.

achievements.name: Inside Man
achievements.description: Use a spy's Poison Stores ability on a settlement 3 times.

achievements.name: Boarding Action
achievements.description: Successfully board a ship during a naval battle.

achievements.name: Ramming Speed!
achievements.description: Destroy an enemy ship by ramming it.

achievements.name: Noctophilia
achievements.description: Fight and win a battle at night.

achievements.name: Hammer & Anvil
achievements.description: Attack an enemy unit in the rear whilst it is already engaged with another.

achievements.name: Raw Recruit
achievements.description: Fight and win a single campaign land battle.

achievements.name: Boatmen
achievements.description: Play and win 1 campaign naval battle

achievements.name: Ram has touched the wall
achievements.description: Play and win 1 campaign siege battle

achievements.name: Fresh meat
achievements.description: Play and win 1 multiplayer Quick Battle

achievements.name: It's a start…
achievements.description: Sink 10 enemy ships during naval battles.

achievements.name: Ride the Dragon's Breath
achievements.description: Fight and win a battle in foggy conditions.

achievements.name: Siege? What Siege?
achievements.description: Fight and win a siege battle without damaging the settlement in any way.

achievements.name: Iron Resolve
achievements.description: Your infantry unit recovers from wavering 3 times during a single campaign battle.

achievements.name: Burning Seas
achievements.description: Use Greek Fire to destroy an enemy ship and its crew.

achievements.name: Semper Fi
achievements.description: Rout a land unit with a marine unit during a campaign battle.

achievements.name: Obey my command!
achievements.description: Successfully rally troops 3 times in a campaign battle

achievements.name: To formation!
achievements.description: Be in a formation while engaging an enemy

achievements.name: Heroic defense
achievements.description: Play and win a campaign siege with only the garrison against 20 or more units of attackers

achievements.name: Burning Convictions
achievements.description: Burn down 75% of an enemy Settlement during a siege battle

achievements.name: Red Sky at Night? Admirals' Delight!
achievements.description: Burn 10 enemy ships during a single campaign battle.

achievements.name: Cost-effective Killer
achievements.description: Fight and win a campaign land battle where you have spent half or less on units than the enemy.

achievements.name: Regular solider
achievements.description: Fight and win 5 campaign land battles.

achievements.name: Seasoned Besieger
achievements.description: Fight and win 5 campaign siege battles.

achievements.name: Seasoned Scrapper
achievements.description: Fight and win 5 multiplayer quick battles.

achievements.name: Watery Graves
achievements.description: Sink 100 enemy ships during naval battles.

achievements.name: Killing Mode
achievements.description: Kill at least 1,000 enemy troops in a campaign battle with a single unit.

achievements.name: Tactical Genius
achievements.description: Use 3 abilities during a single campaign battle.

achievements.name: Access Denied!
achievements.description: Fight and win a siege battle against 20 or more units without the enemy getting onto the walls or into the settlement.

achievements.name: Show No Mercy!
achievements.description: Kill at least 1,000 enemy troops in a single campaign battle.

achievements.name: Legendary General
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign on legendary difficulty without auto-resolving any battles.

achievements.name: Famous General
achievements.description: Fight and win 6 different historical battles.

achievements.name: Veteran General
achievements.description: Fight and win 25 campaign land battles.

achievements.name: Veteran Admiral
achievements.description: Fight and win 25 campaign naval battles.

achievements.name: Veteran Besieger
achievements.description: Fight and win 25 campaign siege battles.

achievements.name: Veteran Scrapper
achievements.description: Fight and win 25 multiplayer quick battles.

achievements.name: Slaughter at Sea
achievements.description: Sink 1,000 enemy ships during naval battles.

achievements.name: The Power of Three
achievements.description: Capture 3 settlements during the Grand Campaign.

achievements.name: Scorched Earth Policy
achievements.description: Completely destroy one of your own settlements to prevent it falling into enemy hands.

achievements.name: Siege Engineer
achievements.description: Field a ballista or onager unit during a campaign siege battle.

achievements.name: Governor
achievements.description: Issue 10 edicts during a single campaign.

achievements.name: Very Cheap Labour
achievements.description: Control a province in which 5% of its income is derived from slaves.

achievements.name: All-Rounder
achievements.description: Research at least 1 technology from each research category.

achievements.name: Sanctuary
achievements.description: Control a province in which 70% of the population are refugees yet public order remains positive.

achievements.name: Head For Business
achievements.description: Ransom 10,000 enemy soldiers.

achievements.name: A Taste for Murder
achievements.description: Assassinate 10 enemy characters.

achievements.name: Veni, Vedi, Vici!
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign by fighting and winning every battle.

achievements.name: Caesar Reborn
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign on legendary difficulty by fighting and winning every battle.

achievements.name: Imperator
achievements.description: Win a campaign on legendary difficulty.

achievements.name: Steppe Survivors
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Alani.

achievements.name: Viking Dawn
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Danes.

achievements.name: Eternal Eagle
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Eastern Roman Empire.

achievements.name: Franci, My Dear, I Couldn't Give a Damn!
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Franks.

achievements.name: Gothic War
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Geats.

achievements.name: Scourge of Civilisation
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Huns.

achievements.name: Jute a Minute!
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Jutes.

achievements.name: Ostrogothic Kingdom
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Ostrogoths.

achievements.name: Sassanid Supremacy
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Sassanid Empire.

achievements.name: Saxon Shores
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Saxons.

achievements.name: Sheer Vandalism
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Vandals.

achievements.name: Visigothic Kingdom
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Visigoths.

achievements.name: I'm Still Standing
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Western Roman Empire.

achievements.name: The Gothic War
achievements.description: Complete the Prologue Campaign.

achievements.name: All men. Some swords
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Alemanni.

achievements.name: The House Red
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Burgundii.

achievements.name: Godan's Chosen
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Langobardi.

achievements.name: A Second Force
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Caledonians.

achievements.name: Eire & Back Again
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Ebdanians.

achievements.name: Pict Apart
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Picts.

achievements.name: The Last Roman
achievements.description: Remain loyal to the Empire, completing the Last Roman Campaign as the Roman Expedition.

achievements.name: Barbaricum Trans Rhenum
achievements.description: Complete the Last Roman Campaign as the Franks.

achievements.name: King of Italy
achievements.description: Declare independence, completing the Last Roman Campaign as Belisarius.

achievements.name: The Sacred & Profane
achievements.description: Complete the Last Roman Campaign as the Ostrogoths.

achievements.name: Abject Vandalism
achievements.description: Complete the Last Roman Campaign as the Vandals.

achievements.name: Tolosanisches Reich
achievements.description: Complete the Last Roman Campaign as the Visigoths.

achievements.name: Kingdom of Gallaecia
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Suebi.

achievements.name: Obelisks to Eternity
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as Aksum.

achievements.name: A Friend to Emperors
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as Himyar.

achievements.name: Tanukhid You Not
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Tanukhids.

achievements.name: One Day in Al-Hirah
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Lakhmids.

achievements.name: Arabia Felix
achievements.description: Capture the historical province of Arabia Felix, consisting of the following regions: Eudaemon, Omana, and Zafar.

achievements.name: Arabia Magna
achievements.description: Capture the historical province of Arabia Magna, consisting of the following regions: Dumatha, Hira, and Yathrib.

achievements.name: Arabia Petraea
achievements.description: Capture the historical province of Arabia Petraea, consisting of the following regions: Aelia Capitolina, Aila, and Nova Trajana Bostra.

achievements.name: Pater Europae
achievements.description: Complete the Age of Charlemagne Campaign as the Kingdom of Charlemagne.

achievements.name: Regnum Asturorum
achievements.description: Complete the Age of Charlemagne Campaign as the Kingdom of Asturias.

achievements.name: Avar Go If You Think You're Hard Enough
achievements.description: Complete the Age of Charlemagne Campaign as the Avars.

achievements.name: Don't Get Umayyad, Get Even
achievements.description: Complete the Age of Charlemagne Campaign as the Emirate of Cordoba.

achievements.name: Furore Normannorum
achievements.description: Complete the Age of Charlemagne Campaign as the Kingdom of the Danes.

achievements.name: Corona Ferrea
achievements.description: Complete the Age of Charlemagne Campaign as the Kingdom of the Lombards.

achievements.name: The Mercian Supremacy
achievements.description: Complete the Age of Charlemagne Campaign as the Kingdom of Mercia.

achievements.name: Epic Westphalia
achievements.description: Complete the Age of Charlemagne Campaign as Westphalia

achievements.name: Hephthalite Scourge
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the White Huns

achievements.name: Upping the Antes
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Anteans.

achievements.name: Vistula Veneti
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Venedians.

achievements.name: Garamantes In Excelsis
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Garamantians.

achievements.name: The Sons of Hyperborea
achievements.description: Complete the Grand Campaign as the Schlavenians.
